mods.abstract: An experiment is discussed that will measure spin-dependent asymmetries in the scattering of polarized electrons on polarized Li atoms. Results are presented for polarizing the atomic beam by the method of optical pumping and for techniques of polarization reversal in both beams which minimize systematic errors.

titleInfo.title: Coherence and correlation in atomic collision

bibliographicCitation.ama: Raith W, Baum G, Caldwell C, Kisker E. Polarized electron-Lithium scattering. In: Kleinpoppen H, ed. Coherence and correlation in atomic collision. Physics of atoms and molecules. New York [u.a.]: Plenum Press; 1980: 567-575.
